description: A delicious burger option for, perfect for a filling lunch or a lighter dinner.
keywords: Plant Based 'Beef' Burger with Lettuce Tomato & Onion
name: Plant Based 'Beef' Burger with Lettuce Tomato & Onion Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Chargrill the burgers for 5 minutes on each side. Heat your buns up on the chargrill also if desired. Serve the burgers on the buns with vegan cheese, lettuce, tomato and ketchup.
